questions.question: This place is famous for its enchanting ………………………………
questions.description: Scenery does not have a plural form.

questions.question: I think we should buy some ……………………………
questions.description: Furniture does not have a plural form.

questions.question: We have not received any …………………………….. about them.
questions.description: Information does not have a plural form.

questions.question: The latest news from across the borders ……………………………. disquieting.
questions.description: News is uncountable and takes a singular verb.

questions.question: The government isn’t doing anything for ……………………………..
questions.description: The unemployed means all unemployed people.

questions.question: There …………………………….. many apples on the tree.
questions.description: If the noun following there is plural, the verb is plural.

questions.question: When I was younger I used to go hiking once ………………………………
You can trust his ……………………………….
questions.description: Advice is a noun advise is the verb. Advice does not have a plural form.

questions.question: He paid two ……………………………. bucks for that laptop.
The ………………………… of Mumbai suits me perfectly.
questions.description: Weather refers to short term changes in the atmosphere. Climate shows what the weather is like over a long period of time.

questions.question: Have you got a lot of ……………………………?
questions.description: Luggage does not have a plural form.
